passage.text: Bone morphogenetic protein-2 (BMP-2) and transforming growth factor-β1 (TGF-β1) alter connexin 43 phosphorylation in MC3T3-E1 Cells
The mRNA or protein levels of Cx43 are not altered by BMP-2 and TGF-1 expression. These factors may reduce the phosphorylated form of this molecule in MC3T3-E1 cells and inhibit GJIC.
